title: Manage Certification Paperwork
description: A certification manager must compile and submit the final package of documents to a regulatory agency to receive a Type Certificate for a new aircraft.

tasks.description: Run a final audit of all compliance documents, test reports, and analyses to ensure the package is complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that all required documents are present and signed.

tasks.description: Digitize and organize all documents according to the regulatory agency's submission guidelines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a fully compliant digital submission package.

tasks.description: Formally submit the package to the regulatory agency and log the submission date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the package and records the action.
